<center>![](http://hostingvps.pw/images/logo.png)</center>

[HostingVPS](http://hostingvps.pw) is here with some new and exiting EU OpenVZ offers! We have a wide range of features, and free DDoS migration included as standard!

<b>Our features include:</b>

* RAID1, SSD Cached 7200 RPM disks.
* DDR3 ECC RAM
* Premium HP Hardware
* Dedicated gigabit uplink

<b>Support</b>

Customer service is our number one priority! We have a professional team of support staff ready to answer any questions or issues that may arise. Our support staff are located around the world to provide rapid and professional ticket and email replies, with no more waiting for ticket 'escalation'!

<b>Plans</b>

We offer a range of plans to cater for most needs. We also provide custom plans, please [open a ticket](https://billing.hostingvps.pw/contact.php) for more info!

> ☛ [OVZ512 - $3.50 per month, or $29.00 per year.](https://billing.hostingvps.pw/cart.php?a=add&pid=12)
> 
> * 512 MB Ram
> * 1024 MB Swap
> * 5TB Bandwidth
> * 1 CPU Core
> * 35 GB Disk Space

> ☛ [OVZ1GB - $5.00 per month or $40.00 per year!](https://billing.hostingvps.pw/cart.php?a=add&pid=6)
> 
> * 1 GB Ram
> * 1.5 GB Swap
> * 5TB Bandwidth
> * 2 CPU Cores
> * 50 GB Disk Space

> ☛ [OVZ2GB - $6.00 per month or $45.00 per year!](https://billing.hostingvps.pw/cart.php?a=add&pid=13)
> 
> * 2 GB Ram
> * 2 GB Swap
> * 5TB Bandwidth
> * 3 CPU Cores
> * 65 GB Disk Space

> ☛ [OVZ3GB - $7.00 per month or $48.00 per year!](https://billing.hostingvps.pw/cart.php?a=add&pid=14)
> 
> * 3 GB Ram
> * 2.5 GB Swap
> * 5TB Bandwidth
> * 4 CPU Cores
> * 75 GB Disk Space

[Terms and Conditions can be found here](http://sz1hosting.com/terms). We also have a range of offers in Las Vegas, please [open a ticket](https://billing.hostingvps.pw/contact.php) to find out more.
 
Las Vegas $20.00 a year 1GB RAM 20GB DISK 1TB B/W
